text: aur hamane moosa par pahale hee se aur daeeyon (ke doodh) ko haraam kar diya tha (ki kisee kee chhaatee se munh na lagaaya) tab moosa kee bahan bolee bhala mai tumhen ek gharaane ka pata bataoo ki vah tumhaaree khaatir is bachche kee paravarish kar denge aur vah yaqeenan isake khairakhvaah hoge
